languages.text: "Почему бы им самим не развлечь нас? Эй, сброд! Прикончите себя сами — или это сделаем мы, и стократ болезненнее!"
"Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"
languages.original_text: "Почему бы им самим не развлечь нас? Эй, сброд! Прикончите себя сами — или это сделаем мы, и стократ болезненнее!"

traits.locale_text: "Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"
"Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"
"Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"
"Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"

languages.text: “不如让他们来招待我们吧？说你们呢，渣滓！赶紧自行了断，否则我们就要动手了，到时候你们的死法会痛苦一百倍！”
languages.original_text: "Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"

traits.locale_text: “不如让他们来招待我们吧？说你们呢，渣滓！赶紧自行了断，否则我们就要动手了，到时候你们的死法会痛苦一百倍！”

languages.text: 「なぜ自分たちでもてなさない？そこのノロマ！自分達で片付けないなら、{mf|俺|私}達がしてやろう…100倍は痛むだろうが、覚悟はいいか！」
languages.original_text: "Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ自分たちでもてなさない？そこのノロマ！自分達で片付けないなら、{mf|俺|私}達がしてやろう…100倍は痛むだろうが、覚悟はいいか！」

languages.text: «¿Y si dejamos que nos entretengan ellos? ¡Vosotros, escoria! ¡Mataos entre vosotros o lo haremos nosotros, ¡y será cien veces más doloroso!».
languages.original_text: "Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si dejamos que nos entretengan ellos? ¡Vosotros, escoria! ¡Mataos entre vosotros o lo haremos nosotros, ¡y será cien veces más doloroso!».

languages.text: « Je serais d'avis de les laisser assurer le spectacle. Vous, là-bas ! Entretuez-vous sur-le-champ, bande de misérables, ou nous vous ferons souffrir mille morts ! »
languages.original_text: "Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"

traits.locale_text: « Je serais d'avis de les laisser assurer le spectacle. Vous, là-bas ! Entretuez-vous sur-le-champ, bande de misérables, ou nous vous ferons souffrir mille morts ! »

languages.text: "Warum lassen wir sie nicht für unsere Unterhaltung sorgen? Hey, Abschaum! Gebt euch gegenseitig den Rest, sonst erledigen wir das, und zwar hundertfach schmerzvoller!"
languages.original_text: "Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"

traits.locale_text: "Warum lassen wir sie nicht für unsere Unterhaltung sorgen? Hey, Abschaum! Gebt euch gegenseitig den Rest, sonst erledigen wir das, und zwar hundertfach schmerzvoller!"

languages.text: "Neden bizi onlar eğlendirmiyor? Baksanıza pislikler! Ya kendi işinizi kendiniz bitirirsiniz ya da yüz kat daha acı çektirerek biz bitiririz!"
languages.original_text: "Why don't they entertain us themselves? You there, scum! Finish yourselves off or else we will, and a hundred times more painfully!"

traits.locale_text: "Neden bizi onlar eğlendirmiyor? Baksanıza pislikler! Ya kendi işinizi kendiniz bitirirsiniz ya da yüz kat daha acı çektirerek biz bitiririz!"
